snippet: The move is part of an effort to rejuvenate the brand and part of its five-year turnaround plan.
abstract: Fiat Chrysler announces it will invest upwards of 500 million euros to make two new engines for Alfa Romeo cars, part of effort to inject life into brand.
lead_paragraph: The move is part of an effort to rejuvenate the brand and part of its five-year turnaround plan.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler to Spend Millions on 2 New Alfa Romeo Engines
headline.print_headline: Fiat Chrysler to Spend Millions on 2 New Alfa Romeo Engines
